name: Hallucinations
description: Generating plausible but factually incorrect information.

name: Omissions
description: Missing important information in the output.

name: Bias
description: Differences in performance for various population subgroups.

name: Policy Violations
description: Generating harmful content that violates safety policies.

name: Confidential Data in Outputs
description: Inadvertently revealing sensitive information in model outputs.

name: Data Drift
description: Performance degradation due to changes in data distribution.

name: Adversarial Attacks and Jailbreaks
description: Being vulnerable to exploits that manipulate model behavior.
